line_1: When condescendingly with smiles she cheered
line_2: Like Dian mid her circling nymphs appeared,

line_1: Away he goes, with Expectation chear'd,
line_2: But when his Course he round the World had steer'd,

line_1: Away he goes, with Expectation chear'd,
line_2: And much had borne, and much had hop'd and fear'd,

line_1: With Pow'r invested, and with Pleasure chear'd;
line_2: Sought by the Good, by the Oppressor fear'd;

line_1: The youth her fluttered spirits cheered,
line_2: To find the priest of Hymen steered.

line_1: Thy heart hath pitied — bounty cheared;
line_2: These sad, sad truths so often heared,

line_1: No ray of hope her sadd'ning fancy cheer'd:
line_2: A nymph celestial in her sight appear'd.

line_1: As with the Sight, our Dreamer's Mind was chear'd;
line_2: Full of Reward, his glorious Lot appear'd,
